trans-unit.source: Represents an SQL transaction to be made at a data source.
trans-unit.target: 데이터 원본에서 만들어지는 SQL 트랜잭션을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 이 클래스는 상속 될 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: The application creates an OleDbTransaction object by calling <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection.BeginTransaction%2A> on the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection> object.
trans-unit.target: 응용 프로그램 호출 하 여 OleDbTransaction 개체를 만듭니다 <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>에 <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection>개체입니다.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection> </xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>

trans-unit.source: All subsequent operations associated with the transaction (for example, committing or aborting the transaction), are performed on the OleDbTransaction object.
trans-unit.target: (예를 들어, 커밋 또는 트랜잭션을 중단) 트랜잭션과 관련 된 모든 후속 작업 OleDbTransaction 개체에서 수행 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Initiates a nested database transaction.
The new transaction is nested within the current transaction.
trans-unit.target: 새 트랜잭션은 현재 트랜잭션 내에 중첩 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: A nested database transaction.
Nested transactions are not supported.
Initiates a nested database transaction and specifies the isolation level to use for the new transaction.
trans-unit.target: 중첩 된 데이터베이스 트랜잭션을 시작 하 고 새 트랜잭션에 사용할 격리 수준을 지정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The new transaction is nested within the current transaction.
trans-unit.target: 새 트랜잭션은 현재 트랜잭션 내에 중첩 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The isolation level to use for the transaction.
A nested database transaction.
Nested transactions are not supported.
Commits the database transaction.
An error occurred while trying to commit the transaction.
trans-unit.target: 트랜잭션을 커밋하는 동안 오류가 발생 했습니다.

trans-unit.source: The transaction has already been committed or rolled back.
-or- The connection is broken.

Gets the <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection"></xref> object associated with the transaction, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the transaction is no longer valid.
trans-unit.target: 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection"> </xref> 에 트랜잭션과 관련 된 개체 또는 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> 트랜잭션이 더 이상 유효한 경우.

trans-unit.source: A single application may have multiple database connections, each with zero or more transactions.
trans-unit.target: 단일 응용 프로그램에는 각각&0; 개 이상의 트랜잭션을 사용 하 여 여러 데이터베이스 연결을 있을 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: This property lets you determine the connection object associated with a particular transaction created by <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성을 사용 하면 <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection.BeginTransaction%2A> 만든 특정 트랜잭션과 관련 된 연결 개체를 확인할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection"></xref> object associated with the transaction.
To be added.
To be added.
Specifies the <xref href="System.Data.IsolationLevel"></xref> for this transaction.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 <xref href="System.Data.IsolationLevel"> </xref> 이 트랜잭션에 대 한 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Parallel transactions are not supported.
Therefore, the <xref:System.Data.IsolationLevel> applies to the whole transaction.
The <xref href="System.Data.IsolationLevel"></xref> for this transaction.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.IsolationLevel"> </xref> 이 트랜잭션에 대 한 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_ReadCommitted" name="ReadCommitted" href=""></xref>.
Rolls back a transaction from a pending state.

The transaction can only be rolled back from a pending state (after <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection.BeginTransaction%2A> has been called, but before <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbTransaction.Commit%2A> is called).
trans-unit.target: 트랜잭션이 롤백할 수 보류 상태에서 (후 <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>호출 하기 전에 <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbTransaction.Commit%2A>라고).</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbTransaction.Commit%2A> </xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>

trans-unit.source: The transaction will be rolled back in the event it is disposed before `Commit` or `Rollback` is called.
trans-unit.target: 다시 이벤트 하기 전에 삭제 되 고 트랜잭션이 롤백됩니다 `Commit` 또는 `Rollback` 라고 합니다.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while trying to commit the transaction.
trans-unit.target: 트랜잭션을 커밋하는 동안 오류가 발생 했습니다.

trans-unit.source: The transaction has already been committed or rolled back.
-or- The connection is broken.
